articles.title: The SA20 and the desperate need for happiness | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz
articles.description: A night in the stands at Newlands showed how the SA20, with its tangled web of power, influence and contradiction, is offering a much-needed opportunity to leave the country's difficulties aside and party the lights out

articles.content: 21:40 Local Time, 17:40 GMT, 23:10 IST: Capitals needed 33 off 24 with Pathan and Powell striking it superbly. Both of them have finished unbeaten, but Vipers have still won by 12 runs. That tells ho… [+475 chars]
